It really makes you think outside the box, with various ways to solve puzzles and â€“ well â€“ I can't say anything more, that'd just spoil the game.
So, yeah. If you like puzzle games and thinking, this is THE game for you. Just brilliant.

My favorite game of all time and the best game i have ever played, hands down.
